title: Counterpick the poster's champion above you
body:
Three simple guidelines
The champion you pick must be a counter pick, otherwise someone else can ignore your post and actually counterpick.
"Banning, disconnecting, surrendering, exiting the game, and ddosing" are not appropriate responses.
Ignore the novelty trolls who keep posting the same champion for everything

Have fun! post small explanations when you can!

I'll start with {{champion:90}}
